name: Fate
description: lock in a mod and reroll all others

name: Empowering
description: randomly apply 1 upgrade point; if impossible, adds new random mod

name: Attuning
description: Turn any non-relic into a relic, dynamically building thematic affixes as needed

name: Learning
description: Instantly level worn relic/attuned item; reroll if none

name: 2x Cloning
description: replace random mod with exact copy of another random mod

name: Negating
description: Chosen mod is negated, resultant points are distributed randomly

name: Sacrificial
description: Use on any lootable object or pile of gold, destroying it; roll on loot table, rerolling results lower than object's equivalent roll

name: 2x Chaotic
description: Reroll all affixes for same number and points

name: Blunt
description: weapon gets -1 dmg die size and random hard doubled enchant

name: Brittle
description: body armour gets -1 AC and random hard tripled enchant

name: 2x Gambling
description: chosen mod's numeric value is rerolled between 0 and double its current value

name: 2x Scourging
description: add random negative mod, then equivalent-value positive mod. Repeated uses on same item replace both mods, increasing the min pt value of the negative by 1.

name: Breeding
description: use on 2 items that are both destroyed, randomly choose base of 1, then alternate between them (starting on non-base) pulling a random mod at a time from each until the point total is at least the highest one
